casebody.data:
WILLIAMS
v.
CSX TRANSPORTATION. No. 190P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 4, 2006. Randall A. Jordan, Mary Helen Moses, Saint Simons Island, GA, for CSX Transportation. H. Forest Horne, Raleigh, for Williams.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 24th day of April 2006 by Defendant to Withdraw Petition for Discretionary Review:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 4th day of May 2006."
